analysis.description:
VikkyToken.reclaimFund (/unique_chucks/17/0x3990240a9ba025c1bdc0116521ed0bfd9b40ec99.sol#421-444) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _participant.transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x3990240a9ba025c1bdc0116521ed0bfd9b40ec99.sol)
